name: Imperfect Pearls
description:
Imperfect Pearls is a short Twine game about spending your morning with the person you've loved for a year. It's a game about intimacy, about having learned to love someone very different from you and the things that make them unique. It's also a game where that person is a nonbinary monster. 

Inspired by a lifelong love of compassionate monster narratives and my own experiences as a disabled person. 

If you enjoyed this story, consider following me on Twitter @Kathy_E_J

Version 1.1 - Updated to fix a small bug causing the wrong breakfast choice to display.
